casename: Public Prosecutor v Kuah Kok Choon
counsel: Hamidul Haq and Thong Chee Kun (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the Public Prosecutor; N Sreenivasan (Derrick Ravi Partnership) for the accused
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Deterrent Sentence Possession of scheduled species without import permit/Whether deterrent sentence appropriate

Statutory Interpretation/Construction of statute/Possession of scheduled species without requisite import permit/Whether prosecution has burden of proving when birds imported/Whether elements of charge proved/Whether forfeiture should be ordered/s 4(2) Endangered Species (Import and Export) Act (Cap 92A)
